keyword: calories in 8 oz new york strip steak
title: Calories in 8 oz New York Strip Steak
meta_description: Discover calories in 8 oz new york strip steak, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per 100 g basis, and preparation tweaks for better tracking.
h1: Calories in 8 oz New York Strip Steak
assumptions: Boneless, trimmed to 1/8" fat, choice grade, broiled or grilled, no added oil or seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, fat trimming, grade, cooking method, and brand; check labels or use a food scale for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: An 8 oz New York strip steak provides ~567 kcal and ~61 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp butter per steak during cooking

faqs.q: How many calories in 8 oz New York strip steak?
faqs.a: Approximately 567 kcal for an 8 oz portion under standard assumptions.

faqs.q: What's the protein content in 8 oz NY strip steak?
faqs.a: About 61 g of protein, making it a high-protein choice.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in New York strip steak?
faqs.a: Yes; grilling or broiling keeps it lower, while frying adds fat and calories.

faqs.q: How much fat is in 8 oz New York strip steak?
faqs.a: Roughly 34 g total fat, including 14 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in New York strip steak?
faqs.a: No carbs, fiber, or sugarsâ€”it's primarily protein and fat.
